tool_name: Inventory and eCommerce hosted and self-hosted solution
tool_description: Use this API to establish an omni channel eCommerce website with a full front end JS GUI to interact with it. Customize the way your inventory data is displayed on your website. Automate invoice processing, merchant API integration and item shipment label creator.  Join now on https://orkiv.com/inventory/inventory.html
title: Inventory and eCommerce hosted and self-hosted solution

api_list.name: All
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://orkiv.p.rapidapi.com/all/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "orkiv.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Orders
api_list.description: Get all item based orders
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://orkiv.p.rapidapi.com/orders/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "orkiv.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Delete item
api_list.description: Remove the specified item ID

api_list.name: Open variation
api_list.description: Open the specified variation.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the variation to open

}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

required_parameters.description: ID of desired service to Update

api_list.description: Get one item

api_list.name: Create | Update Category
api_list.description: Create or Update a category

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: ID of category to update. If none is specified a new category will be created!

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://orkiv.p.rapidapi.com/categories/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "orkiv.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.put(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Update variation
api_list.description: Update variation information

api_list.name: Query
api_list.description: Search your inventory items. Returns 40 items per page

optional_parameters.name: categoryid
optional_parameters.description: Get items under specified category id.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Comma delimited Sort string. ie ; +ordprice. Please use number based fields only

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Performs a regex pattern match against the items' names within your account

api_list.name: Update item variation
api_list.description: Add a new variation to an item.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Valid item id to bind variation to.

api_list.name: Count items
api_list.description: Returns the number of items matching the submitted query.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://orkiv.p.rapidapi.com/items/count"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "orkiv.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Delete category
api_list.description: Removes the category of the specified id

api_list.name: Delete variation
api_list.description: Remove the specified variation

api_list.name: Update Item
api_list.description: Updates the specified item with new data supplied

api_list.name: List items
api_list.description: Used to solely query for items

api_list.name: Delete subscription event

required_parameters.description: Delete event attached to this serviceid
